Lesson 4: Modeling with RsNLME

Source: vignettes/lesson_4.Rmd
lesson_4.Rmd

Lesson 4: Modeling with RsNLME

In Lesson 4, we will introduce modeling capabilities with the RsNLME package and show how we can leverage the RsNLME Model Builder Shiny GUI to create our models in R and learn the RsNLME model building syntax, then extend our workflow to the R command line.




Webinar Overview

In the webinar we will cover the following topics:

  • Define base model
  • Map columns to model variables
  • Set initial estimates
  • Fit model

Webinar Resources

  • Files
  • Presentation

Live Office Hours Date: 8/3/2022 @10am EST

Following the webinar, we will be holding virtual office hours where users may ask their R/RsNLME related questions to the hosts.
